description: Nice, fairly challenging, switchback trail climb with a fast flowy bermed descent. There a few optional wooden features, all well marked with easy ride-arounds.
directions: Leave Castlegar on Hwy 3 heading towards Grand Forks. Turn right 1/2 km past the Timberland Motel on Merry Creek Forest Service Road. Drive 2 km to parking area.
title: Merry-Go-Round > Hail Merry Loop
